content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sasql4.dfs.core.windows.net/contosolake/NYCTaxi/PassengerCountStats_parquetformat/part-00000-9fd920aa-3daa-4e6d-9b19-f601f4c18d79-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
